About

A curated showcase of low impact websites.

This is an open source project by NMF.earth team. Submit a website here.

Low energy consumption website checklist

On chrome, do the light house test, performances should be above 90 and in the Network tab, less than 1MB should be transferred.

  • no custom font
  • no image or few ultra compressed images
  • little css/js
  • no fancy animations
  • no video
  • minified css/js
  • few http request to display the page
